mapper.select: select middletype_id, middletype_name, middletype_bigtyprid, middletype_type, middletype_1, middletype_2, middletype_3 from wph.wph_middletype where middletype_id = #{middletypeId}
select middletype_id, middletype_name, middletype_bigtyprid, middletype_type, middletype_1, middletype_2, middletype_3 from wph.wph_middletype limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into wph.wph_middletype(middletype_name, middletype_bigtyprid, middletype_type, middletype_1, middletype_2, middletype_3) values (#{middletypeName}, #{middletypeBigtyprid}, #{middletypeType}, #{middletype_1}, #{middletype_2}, #{middletype_3})
mapper.update:
update wph.wph_middletype
middletype_name = #{middletypeName},
middletype_bigtyprid = #{middletypeBigtyprid},
middletype_type = #{middletypeType},
middletype_1 = #{middletype_1},
middletype_2 = #{middletype_2},
middletype_3 = #{middletype_3},
where middletype_id = #{middletypeId}
